name: Football Cup Superstars
description:
Play the most exciting and fun arcade soccer game with Football Cup Superstars!

Choose your favorite national team from among the 32 qualified squads, find numerous soccer superstars and lead them to the top!

Run, pass and dodge defenders, and shoot amazing goals. Master your moves and grab power-ups to unleash unstoppable soccer skills to score! Then celebrate just like your favorite idols of the game as you win your group matches and progress to the finals.

With such fun & simple controls (you can pass and shoot with just a flick), this is the arcade soccer game everyone can enjoy, not just soccer fans!

The Soccer Cup is waiting, so join the competition!

Features:

- Play with your favorite soccer superstars, each with their own skills and personality, and the 32 qualifying national teams for the competition

- Celebrate your goals like a star with 10 awesome celebrations

- Enjoy intuitive controls: Tap with one finger to pass the ball, avoid defenders and shoot

- Collect power-ups to unleash unstoppable soccer skills

- Take on your rivals across a thrilling atmosphere presented in beautiful 3D graphics

- Set a high score on the leaderboard to show who's the ultimate soccer player
